title: Where We Are, What We See: The Best Young Writers and Artists in America
description: The Best Young Writers and Artists in America, drawn from the 2002, 2003, and 2004 winners of the Scholastic Art and Writing Awards.The best and the brightest -- startling stories, poetry, essays, reportage, and artwork from across America, care of the Scholastic Art & Writing Awards. YOU ARE HERE, THIS IS NOW II is the definitive anthology of young writers and artists.
author: David Levithan
